attributes.action: Increase tax and have a higher VAT on imported products and produce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will be an incentive for companies to keep manufacturing within the UK, and allow UK farmers to compete with foreign produce. A lower tax/VAT for local products and produce would increase the incentive for businesses to remain in this country and for UK residents to purchase UK products and produce.
